ctx: intros net h st' ps' gd out d l H_handleTimeout H_updateElectionsDataTimeout H_P H_reachable H_st' H_ps'.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface taifoli : terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface net : network h : name st' : name -> data ps' : list packet gd : electionsData out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) H_handleTimeout : handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) H_updateElectionsDataTimeout : gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) H_P : forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0 H_reachable : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H_st' : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h' H_ps' : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h l) Unable to unify "forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0" with "forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h)))) -> eIndex e > 0".

original: unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout, allEntries_indices_gt_0. intros net h st' ps' gd out d l H_handleTimeout H_updateElectionsDataTimeout H_P H_reachable H_st' H_ps'. apply H_P; auto.
